content.text:
Actually `ssb-server createFriendStream` might be helpful, although I think you'll need to run ssb-server or Patchbay to get it running (Patchwork uses its own logic for friends IIRC):

```console
$ ssb-server friends.createFriendStream --help
friends.createFriendStream # same as `stream`, but output is series of `{id: <FeedId>, hops: <hops>}`
  --start [FeedId]  # feed at which to start traversing graph from, default to your own feed id
  --max   [number]  # include feeds less than or equal to this number of hops
  --live  [boolean] # include real time results, defaults to false
  --old   [boolean] # include old results, defaults to true
```
